org.xlbean.xlscript.processor

Class AbstractXlScriptProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlbean.xlscript.processor.AbstractXlScriptProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XlScriptProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XlScriptSingleDefinitionProcessor, XlScriptTableDefinitionProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractXlScriptProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements XlScriptProcessor
    Abstract class for XlScriptProcessors which executes XlBean values as Groovy script.

      • isScript

        protected boolean isScript(java.lang.String markedScript)

      • trimIfScript

        protected java.lang.String trimIfScript(java.lang.String markedScript)
        Returns actual script with "`" trimmed.

        If given markedScript doesn't match script format, then it returns null.

        Parameters:
        markedScript -
        Returns:

      • evaluate

        protected java.lang.Object evaluate(java.lang.String markedScript,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> excel,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> optional)
        Execute markedScript as Groovy script if it is surrounded by backslash. (e.g. `some script here`)

        This method will set following beans to binding context of the script.

        • $excel: excel object given as parameter
        • keys in $excel: For instance, if $excel contains "testList", then it is accessible from script by either "testList" or "$excel.testList"
        • $it: listElement object
        • keys in listElement
        • keys in optional

        Parameters:
        markedScript -
        excel -
        listElement -
        Returns:
